properties.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova, frack113
properties.description: Detects the use of the Microsoft signed script "CL_mutexverifiers" to proxy the execution of additional PowerShell script commands
properties.displayName: Potential Script Proxy Execution Via CL_Mutexverifiers.ps1
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -nologo -windowstyle minimized -file " and FolderPath endswith "\\powershell.exe" and (InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\powershell.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\pwsh.exe")) and (ProcessCommandLine contains "\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Windows\\Temp\\")
